message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-value item. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at $20000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'd be willing to consider purchasing the product for $15000. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer you the product for $18000. Is this a more comfortable price for you?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to consider purchasing the product for $16000. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I'm not quite willing to go to $16000, Bob, but I'm willing to compromise a bit further. I'll offer you the product for $17500. This is my best offer, and I'm hoping you'll find it more reasonable.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to consider purchasing the product for $16000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping you'll accept it.

I've already made a few concessions, Bob, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $17000. I'm starting to think that we're not on the same page, and I'd rather explore other options. I'll give you one more chance to meet me at $17000, but if not, I'll have to consider other buyers.
